summary: Two friends walk around the city one afternoon, on the verge of imminent Apocalypse.
cast: Pablo Mezz|Carlos Hendrick Huber|Alan Aguilar|Berta Soní|Hugo Catalán|Roberto Beck|Óliver Rendón|Naomy Romo|Gerardo Del Razo|Ricardo Enríquez|Jonathan Ramos|Rubén Santiago|Roberto de Loera|Diego Cruz Cilveti|Roberto Fiesco|Max Thomsen|Oliver Rendón|Axel Arenas|Ana Lourdes Zamarrón|Mauricio Hernández Contreras
title: Velociraptor
